short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Porsche Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Porsche background. Porsche wallpaper background themes for car fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Porsche wallpapers with each new tab opened.
2. Choose a random Porsche background or set a favorite through the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Quick links to emails and social media platforms.
5. Displays the current date and time automatically.
6. New Note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Quick navigation to frequently visited websites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel addition for rapid website access.
10. Direct links to Google applications.
11. Immediate access to additional themes.
12. Streamlined sharing to social media.
13. Instant access to download wallpapers.
14. Quick access to games.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Porsche new tab.
